mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM (ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_TAG, ITEM_AMOUNT) VALUES (ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemContent}, #{itemTag}, #{itemAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_AMOUNT = #{itemAmount} WHERE ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
